title: Cabo Corso: A Novel
description: Time heals all wounds, or so they say. What happens though when hate burns so strongly that neither time nor even death can withstand it? Set in Ghana's Cape Coast Castle, six friends find themselves trapped within the castle walls with a crazed maniac and the tormented soul of a vengeful slave. The atrocities of the slave trade come to haunt the present in this gripping tale of love, horror, and redemption! This is an exceptional book and read.
author: Kofi O. Okyere
